articles.title: JetBlue dropping service to these cities after deals with Spirit, American blocked - New York Post
articles.description: JetBlue has lost more than $2 billion since its last profitable year, 2019.
articles.content:
JetBlue Airways will end service at several cities and reduce flying out of Los Angeles in a move to retrench and focus on stronger markets after years of losing money.

articles.title: Japanese Yen slides to near two-week low against USD ahead of BoJ policy decision - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) drifts lower for the sixth straight day on Tuesday and weakens to a nearly two-week low against its American counterpart during the Asian session.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen continues losing ground after the BoJ announced its policy decision.
